author: SirDallin
comment: These watch faces are really nice! The only problem is they took a couple days to come in! But they are worth the few dollars

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It happens sometimes. Try to resync your watch and phone and wait a little bit. If it does not help, you can try to make a factory reset of the watch. But it is not needed in most of the cases. Also if trouble don`t solve write us - wearables@boost.solutions

title: They are nice!

author: Marco Tiero
comment: Need help! Having problems with this on my Smartwatch 3 since I upgraded my phone to Oreo. Every time I install to my watch it remove itself.

author: Aaron Ainscough
comment: Really great app especially the preview option!

author: Brendan Fraser
comment: Can only access one of the faces and cannot change settings. Otherwise great app

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Hi, Brendan,

The app works as a catalog and customization tool. There are few watchfaces that are already pre-installed (like Pizza), but most of them, both free and paid, are installed via the Google Play (just like any other Wear app). Also, not all of the watchfaces have the same customization features.

Hope this helps!

author: David Colvin
comment: I really like this watch face. It's very polished. The only thing I would like to see implemented is the ability to change the date and battery level. I would like to be able to check my phone battery and check the current temperature. The watch battery is too easy to check and seems like a waste of notification space.
title: Almost There

author: Thomas Hostler
comment: Is nice but it annoys me that the time is down the bottom so that notifications cover it up. Would REALLY love the option to have the ambient version as the watch for the whole time, is that possible?

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Hello! We know that the time in the bottom is not the best position, but in this case it is the only way to show time and Deadpool on the watch and do it nice.
About the ambient mode, we can do an option like this, but it doesn’t match Android Wear performance requirements. For more info, please, contact us: wearables@boost.solutions

title: Nice

author: Adam Savage
comment: The only thing I needed was the ambient mode as an all the time option. Something low power.
title: Almost loved it

author: Richard Mordew
comment: It's good but needs to get rid of the stupid white rectangle, what's the point of it 😕
title: Mangla Media

author: Tony Gallucci
comment: Downloaded this for my huawei watch and it won't show up and it's no where to be found, so I can't use it

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It takes some time to synchronize it to the watch. Also you may try to resync your watch with the phone. If you are still experiencing some issues, please, contact us via e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions and we will help you

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It may take some time to synchronize it to the watch. Also you may try to resync your watch with the phone. If you are still experiencing some issues, please, contact us via e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions and we will help you

title: Not working

author: Ben & Amity Sheridan
comment: Love it
title: It is funny .

author: Robert Sullivan
comment: Why no Samsung?

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It works on Samsung Gear Live. Other Samsung watches uses Tizen OS. This watch face is developed for Android Wear and doesn’t work on Tizen OS. We will release this watch face for Tizen OS later.
